abstract: Darius Jones of Harlem received aid from Community Service Society of New York to buy monthly metro cards to aid in his commute; society is one of organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: Darius Jones is determined to turn his natural curiosity with computers into a full-time job in technical support.

headline.main: Walking Past Obstacles to Create a Steady Career Solving Computer Issues
headline.print_headline: Walking Past Obstacles to Create a Steady Career Solving Computer Issues

snippet: Darius Jones is determined to turn his natural curiosity with computers into a full-time job in technical support.
